title: ScrollingFrame

name: ScrollingFrame
type: class
memorycategory: Gui
summary: |
  ScrollingFrame is a special Class.Frame type with built-in scrolling
  interactivity and different ways to customize how the scrolling works.
description: |
  ScrollingFrame is a special Class.Frame type with built-in scrolling
  interactivity and different ways to customize how the scrolling works.


codesamples: []
inherits:
  - GuiObject
descendants: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
properties:
  - name: ScrollingFrame.AbsoluteCanvasSize
    summary: |
      The size of the area that is scrollable, in offsets.
    description: |
      The size of the area that is scrollable, in offsets. This property is set
      to the maximum of the Class.ScrollingFrame.CanvasSize|CanvasSize
      property and the size of the children if
      Class.ScrollingFrame.AutomaticCanvasSize|AutomaticCanvasSize is set to
      something other than Enum.AutomaticSize.None.
    codesamples: []
    type: Vector2
    tags:
      - ReadOnly
      - NotReplicated
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    category: Scrolling
    serialization:
      canload: false
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: ScrollingFrame.AbsoluteWindowSize
    summary: |
      The size of the frame, in offsets, without the scroll bars.
    description: |
      The size of the frame, in offsets, without the scroll bars.
    codesamples: []
    type: Vector2
    tags:
      - ReadOnly
      - NotReplicated
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    category: Scrolling
    serialization:
      canload: false
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: ScrollingFrame.AutomaticCanvasSize
    summary: |
      Determines whether Class.ScrollingFrame.CanvasSize is resized based on
      child content.
    description: |
      This property is used to automatically size parent UI objects based on the
      size of its descendants. You can use this property to dynamically add text
      and other content to a ScrollingFrame at edit or run time and the size
      will adjust to fit that content.

      When this property is set to an Enum.AutomaticSize value other than
      Enum.AutomaticSize|None,
      Class.ScrollingFrame.AbsoluteCanvasSize|AbsoluteCanvasSize may resize
      depending on its child content.
    codesamples: []
    type: AutomaticSize
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Scrolling
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: ScrollingFrame.BottomImage
    summary: |
      Image that displays on the bottom of a vertical scroll bar, or the right
      of a horizontal scroll bar (rotated 90° counterclockwise for a
      horizontal scroll bar).
    description: |
      Image that displays on the bottom of a vertical scroll bar, or the right
      of a horizontal scroll bar (rotated 90° counterclockwise for a
      horizontal scroll bar).


    codesamples: []
    type: ContentId
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Scrolling
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: ScrollingFrame.BottomImageContent
    summary: |
      Image that displays on the bottom of a vertical scroll bar, or the right
      of a horizontal scroll bar (rotated 90° counterclockwise for a
      horizontal scroll bar). Only supports asset URIs as textures.
    description: |
      Image that displays on the bottom of a vertical scroll bar, or the right
      of a horizontal scroll bar (rotated 90° counterclockwise for a
      horizontal scroll bar).


    codesamples: []
    type: Content
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Scrolling
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: ScrollingFrame.CanvasPosition
    summary: |
      Reflects the current positional offset of the canvas within the frame,
      in pixels, and sets the position of scroll bars accordingly.
    description: |
      Reflects the current positional offset of the canvas within the frame,
      in pixels, and sets the position of scroll bars accordingly. Note that
      this property doesn't do anything if scroll bars aren't visible.
    codesamples: []
    type: Vector2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Scrolling
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: ScrollingFrame.CanvasSize
    summary: |
      Determines the size of the scrollable area.
    description: |
      Determines the size of the scrollable area. For an adaptive alternative
      based on the overall size of children within the ScrollingFrame,
      consider using
      Class.ScrollingFrame.AutomaticCanvasSize|AutomaticCanvasSize.
    codesamples: []
    type: UDim2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Scrolling
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: ScrollingFrame.ElasticBehavior
    summary: |
      Determines if and when elastic scrolling is allowed on touch‑enabled
      devices.
    description: |
      This property determines if and when elastic scrolling is allowed on
      touch‑enabled devices. Defaults to Enum.ElasticBehavior|WhenScrollable.
    codesamples: []
    type: ElasticBehavior
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Scrolling
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: ScrollingFrame.HorizontalScrollBarInset
    summary: |
      Indicates whether Class.ScrollingFrame.CanvasSize|CanvasSize is inset by
      Class.ScrollingFrame.ScrollBarThickness|ScrollBarThickness on the
      horizontal axis.
    description: |
      Indicates whether Class.ScrollingFrame.CanvasSize|CanvasSize is inset by
      Class.ScrollingFrame.ScrollBarThickness|ScrollBarThickness on the
      horizontal axis.
    codesamples: []
    type: ScrollBarInset
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Scrolling
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: ScrollingFrame.MidImage
    summary: |
      Image which spans the area between
      Class.ScrollingFrame.TopImage|TopImage and
      Class.ScrollingFrame.BottomImage|BottomImage (rotated 90°
      counterclockwise for a horizontal scroll bar).
    description: |
      Image which spans the area between
      Class.ScrollingFrame.TopImage|TopImage and
      Class.ScrollingFrame.BottomImage|BottomImage (rotated 90°
      counterclockwise for a horizontal scroll bar). This image automatically
      scales to fill the space between the cap segments.


    codesamples: []
    type: ContentId
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Scrolling
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: ScrollingFrame.MidImageContent
    summary: |
      Image which spans the area between
      Class.ScrollingFrame.TopImageContent|TopImageContent and
      Class.ScrollingFrame.BottomImageContent|BottomImageContent (rotated
      90° counterclockwise for a horizontal scroll bar). Only supports asset
      URIs as textures.
    description: |
      Image which spans the area between
      Class.ScrollingFrame.TopImage|TopImage and
      Class.ScrollingFrame.BottomImage|BottomImage (rotated 90°
      counterclockwise for a horizontal scroll bar). This image automatically
      scales to fill the space between the cap segments.


    codesamples: []
    type: Content
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Scrolling
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: ScrollingFrame.ScrollBarImageColor3
    summary: |
      Determines how the rendered scroll bar images are colorized.
    description: |
      Determines how the scroll bar images
      (Class.ScrollingFrame.TopImage|TopImage,
      Class.ScrollingFrame.MidImage|MidImage,
      Class.ScrollingFrame.BottomImage|BottomImage) are colorized. When set to
      white, no colorization occurs. This property is useful for reusing image
      assets; if the source images are completely white with transparency, you
      can set the color of the entire scroll bar at once.
    codesamples: []
    type: Color3
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Scrolling
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: ScrollingFrame.ScrollBarImageTransparency
    summary: |
      Determines the opacity of the scroll bar images.
    description: |
      Determines the opacity of the scroll bar images
      (Class.ScrollingFrame.TopImage|TopImage,
      Class.ScrollingFrame.MidImage|MidImage,
      Class.ScrollingFrame.BottomImage|BottomImage). A value of 0 is
      completely opaque and a value of 1 is completely transparent
      (invisible).
    codesamples: []
    type: float
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Scrolling
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: ScrollingFrame.ScrollBarThickness
    summary: |
      Thickness of the scroll bar in pixels; applies to both horizontal and
      vertical scroll bars.
    description: |
      Thickness of the scroll bar in pixels; applies to both horizontal and
      vertical scroll bars. If set to 0, no scroll bars are rendered.
    codesamples: []
    type: int
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Scrolling
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: ScrollingFrame.ScrollingDirection
    summary: |
      Determines the direction(s) in which scrolling is allowed.
    description: |
      This property determines the direction(s) in which scrolling is allowed.
      If scrolling is disallowed in a direction, the associated scroll bar will
      not appear. Defaults to Enum.ScrollingDirection.XY.
    codesamples: []
    type: ScrollingDirection
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Scrolling
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: ScrollingFrame.ScrollingEnabled
    summary: |
      Determines whether scrolling is allowed on the frame.
    description: |
      Determines whether scrolling is allowed on the frame. If false, no
      scroll bars will be rendered.
    codesamples: []
    type: boolean
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Scrolling
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: ScrollingFrame.TopImage
    summary: |
      Image which displays on the top of a vertical scroll bar, or the left of a
      horizontal scroll bar (rotated 90° counterclockwise for a horizontal
      scroll bar).
    description: |
      Image which displays on the top of a vertical scroll bar, or the left of a
      horizontal scroll bar (rotated 90° counterclockwise for a horizontal
      scroll bar).


    codesamples: []
    type: ContentId
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None

    threadsafety: ReadSafe

      cansave: true

  - name: ScrollingFrame.VerticalScrollBarInset
    summary: |
      Indicates whether Class.ScrollingFrame.CanvasSize|CanvasSize is inset by
      Class.ScrollingFrame.ScrollBarThickness|ScrollBarThickness on the
      vertical axis.
    description: |
      Indicates whether Class.ScrollingFrame.CanvasSize|CanvasSize is inset by

  - name: ScrollingFrame.VerticalScrollBarPosition
    summary: |
      Indicates whether the vertical scroll bar is positioned to the left or
      right of the canvas.
    description: |
      Indicates whether the vertical scroll bar is positioned to the left or
      right of the canvas. Defaults to Enum.VerticalScrollBarPosition.Right.
